data.message: Would be great if the search feature worked the way it should.

replies.message: Thanks for the feedback, Honey. Could you provide a little more information about the issue you’re experiencing? -Sarah

Yeah.  Facebook search doesn't work worth a s**t!  Used to be able to refine searches with age ranges, city, a myriad of other options.  Now, that's all gone, and the search results that do show up are usually completely useless

If you want to search for your own posts, photo albums, individual photos, videos, places, events and comments by keywords or specifying a time window, you can use Search For Posts App for iOS. https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/search-for-posts/id661005085
